forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h late.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph late.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm in the morning, then some lingering showers still possible in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
